title: Behavior of a function based on derivative graph

content.description: The graph of f', the derivative of the function f, is shown in the figure above.
content.question:
Which of the following statements must be true?

f is continuous on the open interval (a, b).

f is decreasing on the open interval (a, b).

The graph of f is concave down on the open interval (a, b).

topic.text: 5.9: Connecting a Function, Its First Derivative, and Its Second Derivative

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
